attributes.action: Implement councils to freeze council tax payments in full during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to instruct local councils to freeze all payments for 3 months to help people who are struggling to get through this tough time.
attributes.background: During this time people may not be able to pay bills one being the council tax,if payments are behind this usually ends up going to a debt collection agency .Local councils need to realise this can lead to mental health issue and during this time tenants may struggle with payments.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
